item.title: No installs - just containers
item.description: It can be annoying to install a tool that is only needed a few times, and it would be preferable to avoid the installation process. However, sometimes it is necessary to use a tool to accomplish a specific task Solution To avoid the inconvenience of installing tools that are only needed occasionally, I have started using containerized tools instead.
